amendment.description: Amendment to provide an additional $33.677 billion in total spending to cover current and anticipated needs in the wake of the devastating Hurricane Sandy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to provide an additional $33.677 billion in total spending to cover current and anticipated needs in the wake of the devastating Hurricane Sandy. This funding is in addition to the amendment submitted by Chairman Rogers.

action.text: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 192 (Roll no. 22).
